channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Strategy Questions
item.description: My new book (out today) contains more than 500 questions. Here are some to get you started:

item.title: Thoughts on audiobooks
item.description: I’m listening more than reading these days, and I find that a good audiobook can make a real impact on the way I absorb and learn from a book. It’s a ...

item.title: Full circle with myopia

item.title: How Web Accessibility Is Opening Doors For The Retail Industry
item.description: By prioritizing accessibility, you can set your business up for greater success this holiday season and well into the future.

item.title: Important problems
item.description: Some problems are easy to solve, others are difficult, requiring a lot more labor, willpower, resources and coordination. Some problems have simple so...

item.title: Evasive Security Threats Bypass Enterprise Defenses Via The Browser
item.description: Enterprises need to add browser security to their risk management plans.

item.title: U.K. Bombing Survivors Win Case Against Conspiracy Theorist
item.description: A U.K. court has ruled against a man who claimed that the bombng attack at an Ariana Grande concert in 2017 was an "elaborate hoax".

item.title: A Look At How Satellite Technology Promises To Plug Connectivity Gaps
item.description: Satellite enables forward-thinking businesses to leverage advanced technology for global connectivity, resilience and innovation.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S24 Smartphone Hacked During $1 Million Zero Day Spree
